title: New Email
body: Does anyone know if you can, switch emails without being able to access the original one? My email got shut down after moving because century link blows, and now i cant get into my email for league or change it to my current one.{{champion:32}}

replies.body: You won't be able to change it on your own, but if you [write a ticket into us](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we should be able to take care of it!  You might have to go through some steps to verify that you are the original owner though :)
